Package fr.ign.artiscales.pm.scenario

Class PMStep

java.lang.Object
fr.ign.artiscales.pm.scenario.PMStep
public class PMStep
extends java.lang.Object
Object representing each step of a Parcel Manager scenario. This object is automatically set by the PMScenario object.
See Also:
scenarioCreation.md

      public PMStep​(java.lang.String workflow, java.lang.String parcelProcess, java.lang.String genericZone, java.lang.String preciseZone, java.lang.String communityNumber, java.lang.String communityType, java.lang.String urbanFabricType)

  • Method Details

    • setFiles

      public static void setFiles​(java.io.File parcelFile, java.io.File zoningFile, java.io.File buildingFile, java.io.File roadFile, java.io.File predicateFile, java.io.File polygonIntersection, java.io.File zone, java.io.File outFolder, java.io.File profileFolder)
      Set the path of the different files for a PMStep to be executed. The method is used by PMScenario in a static way because it has no reasons to change within a PM simulation, except for the parcel file that must be updated after each PMStep to make the new PMStep simulation on an already simulated parcel plan

    • execute

      public java.io.File execute() throws java.io.IOException
      Execute the current PM Step.
      Returns:
      The ShapeFile containing the whole parcels of the given collection, where the simulated parcel have replaced the former parcels.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - tons of reading and writing

    • getSimulationParcels

      public org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection getSimulationParcels​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection parcelIn) throws java.io.IOException
      Mark the parcels that must be simulated within a collection of parcels.

      It first select the parcel of the zone studied, whether by a city code or by a zone type. The fields can be set with the setters of the ParcelGetter class.

      Then it marks the interesting parcels that either cross a given polygon collection or intersects a zoning type. It return even the parcels that won't be simulated. Split field name in "SPLIT" by default and can be changed with the method MarkParcelAttributeFromPosition.setMarkFieldName(String).

      If none of this informations are set, the algorithm selects all the parcels.

      Returns:
      The parcel collection with a mark for the interesting parcels to simulate.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getBoundsOfZone

      public java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> getBoundsOfZone() throws java.io.IOException
      Generate the bound of the parcels that are simulated by the current PMStep. Uses the marked parcels by the getSimulationParcels(SimpleFeatureCollection) method.
      Returns:
      A list of the geometries of the simulated parcels
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getZone

      private org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection getZone​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection parcel) throws java.io.IOException
      Get the zones to simulate for the Zone Division workflow. If a specific zone input is set at the ZONE location, it will automatically get and return it.
      Parameters:
      parcel -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
